alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Lafayette; Miller; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 1:53AM CDT until April 05 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Central Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 152 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fulton to 10 miles northwest of Garland to near Fouke to near Ravanna to near Rodessa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Hope, Stamps, Waldo, Lewisville, McNeil, Fouke, Bradley, Taylor, Emmet, Buckner, Perrytown, Rosston, Garland, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, Smithland, Macedonia and Bussey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southwestern Arkansas.
